strategy: Minervan Tank Legion armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Minervan Tank Legion Regiment

formations.name: Minervan Tank Company
formations.units: One Leman Russ Vanquisher with a Commissar-Captain, nine Leman Russ
extraUnits: Replace nine Leman Russ with nine Leman Russ Thunderers: Free
Replace the Leman Russ Vanquisher with a Leman Russ Thunderer: Free

formations.name: Minervan Super-Heavy Company
formations.units: Three Baneblades, Stormblades, Stormswords, and/or Shadowswords, one with a Commissar-Captain
extraUnits: Upgrade one Baneblade to a Stormhammer: 25 points

formations.name: Artillery Company
formations.units: Six Basilisks, one with a Commissar-Captain
extraUnits: Replace six Basilisks with six Manticores: 50 points
Add up to two Deathstrikes to the formation: 50 points each

sections.name: Minervan Support Formations
sections.description: Up to three Support Formations for each Minervan Company.

formations.name: Leman Russ Squadron
extraUnits: Replace four Leman Russ with four Leman Russ Executioners, four Leman Russ Exterminators, four Leman Russ Demolishers, four Leman Russ Punishers, four Leman Russ Thunderers or four Leman Russ Conquerors

formations.name: Artillery Battery
formations.units: Three Basilisks, three Bombards or four Medusa
extraUnits: Replace three Basilisks with three Manticores: 25 points
Add one Deathstrike to the formation: 50 points

formations.name: Super-Heavy Platoon
formations.units: One Baneblade, Stormsword, Shadowsword, or Stormblade

sections.name: Collegia Titanica and Imperial Navy Formations
